item.title: Privacy policy
item.description: Last Updated: May 25, 2021 This privacy policy describes how Octavian Hasna (“I”) and 3rd parties services (both “we”) collect, use and share personal information of consumer users of the website (“site”) and of the following apps (“products”): DexOffline for Windows DexOffline Plus for Windows DexOffline for Android DexOffline Plus for Android DexOffline for iOS DexOffline Plus for iOS What we collect We get information about you in a range of ways.
